  • Costruzione ed esecuzione di processi di data quality e di data validation
  • Analisi delle serie storiche dei dati con identificazione dei trend emergenti
  • Applicazione di tecniche di interpolazione, estrapolazione sulle evidenze di business
  • Costruzione ed elaborazione di un sistema di Advanced Analytics integrato ed automatizzato per il monitoraggio dei principali KPI‚Äôs di produzione e di andamento tecnico
  • Interpretazione quantitativa e qualitativa dei risultati per suggerire lo sviluppo del business
  • Costruzione di sistemi di ‚ÄúEarly warning‚Äù e supporto alla definizione di modelli predittivi di retention/conversion e di elasticit√† del prezzo
  • Benchmark di competitivit√† e pi√π in generale attivit√† di market intelligence

Requisiti

  • Almeno 2 anni di esperienza nel ruolo, preferibilmente in ambito finanziario/assicurativo/economico
  • Capacit√† non solo di programmazione con linguaggi specializzati per l'analisi statistica (Python, R, SQL) ma anche di gestione dell'architettura del codice utilizzato
  • Conoscenza di software di data visualization/guided analytics (Tableau, PowerBI, QlikView ‚Ä¶)
  • Capacit√† di debugging
  • Passione per la ‚Äúdata culture‚Äù
  • Livello avanzato di conoscenza della lingua inglese
  • Orientamento al raggiungimento degli obiettivi

Completano Il Profilo

  • Conoscenza delle tecniche statistiche multivariate parametriche (Es. GLM) e di machine learning per la valutazione e personalizzazione del rischio
  • Conoscenza di Azure Databricks
  • Preferibile conoscenza di software di data visualization/guided analytics (Tableau, PowerBI, QlikView)

Benefit

  • Smartworking
  • Buoni pasto
  • Mensa aziendale
  • Giorno libero per il proprio compleanno
  • Convenzioni e scontistiche dedicate ai dipendenti

Informazioni contrattuali: Parleremo delle informazioni contrattuali in sede di colloquio in modo da offrirti il giusto compenso adeguandolo alla reale esperienza e alla tua competenza. L‚Äôorario di lavoro √® Full Time.

Predisporre la reportistica di andamento del servizio dei fornitori

Rappresenta un plus la conoscenza degli applicativi Qlik View, Qlik Sense, Google Cloud Platform o altri linguaggi di programmazione

Buoni pasto elettronici
Salute e benessere: assistenza sanitaria integrativa,¬†supporto psicologico attraverso counseling, webinar dedicati al benessere psicofisico e vaccino antinfluenzale
Famiglia: A2A Life Caring, iniziativa a supporto della genitorialit√† attraverso un mese aggiuntivo retribuito al 100% per maternit√†/paternit√†, rimborsi spese per figli, convenzioni con asili nido, team coaching per neogenitori; spazio caregiver,¬†offriamo webinar e uno spazio di ascolto dedicati a chi si prende cura di persone fragili o non autosufficienti

Risparmio e tempo libero: oltre 300 convenzioni, tra cui trasporti pubblici, attivit√† sportive, viaggi, eventi culturali, e offerte speciali per luce e gas. Opzioni per il car sharing e la conversione del premio di risultato in benefit di welfare
Ambiente di lavoro:¬†promuoviamo una cultura che valorizza la diversit√†, l‚Äôequit√† e l'inclusione (DE&I); potrai inoltre avere la possibilit√† di unirti a un team dedicato allo sviluppo di iniziative e progetti su queste tematiche. Title: Junior ‚Äì Operations Excellence AI/GenAI
Description:
Stiamo cercando una figura junior da inserire nel team di Operations Excellence di Deloitte sulla sede di Milano, che lavorer√† in modalit√† Hybrid.

All‚Äôinterno del team avrai l‚Äôoccasione di crescere occupandoti di supportare la trasformazione delle istituzioni finanziarie per le quali lavoriamo a seguito di esigenze che possono nascere dal business e contesto di mercato del cliente e/o da adeguamenti degli stessi dettati dal rispetto e aderenza alle normative bancarie/assicurative. In particolare ti occuperai di concretizzare le esigenze strategiche dei nostri clienti attraverso progetti fortemente innovativi che coprono tutta la value chain aziendale e spaziano su molteplici ambiti di competenze eterogenee e multidisciplinari.

Your Role

La risorsa Junior sar√† inserita all'interno di un team di lavoro, affiancando colleghi senior e occupandosi di:


Lavorare a stretto contatto con il team e con i clienti per comprendere le esigenze di business e tradurle in metodologie ed approcci coerenti ad esse;
Sviluppo e gestione dell‚Äôinnovazione tecnologica e strategica;
Lavorare in ambito analytics ed in progetti di digitalizzazione utilizzando strumenti e tecnologie di tendenza come data management, automatizzazione dei processi, Gen AI ecc‚Ä¶
Supportare i clienti nell‚Äôanalisi attraverso l‚Äôelaborazione e la gestione delle basi informative per identificare trend, pattern e insight rilevanti; e nella visualizzazione dei dati attraverso il disegno e lo sviluppo di report e dashboard.


Winning Requirements


Laurea/Master in ambito STEM;
Interesse per tecnologie e strumenti di AI/Gen AI, Data Management, Data Visualization (Tableau, Power BI o Qlik); e cloud computing;
Conoscenza di almeno un linguaggio di programmazione (tra SQL, Python, R). Rappresenterebbe un must la conoscenza di librerie specifiche, come Pandas, Numpy, Scikit-learn, SciPy ecc‚Ä¶
Buona conoscenza della‚ÄØlingua‚ÄØinglese;
Buona conoscenza del Pacchetto Office (Excel, PPT);
Forte motivazione a sviluppare competenze nel campo dei dati, dall'acquisizione all'analisi e presentazione e curiosit√† per le nuove tecnologie e le tendenze del settore.


Make An Impact That Matters

Deloitte √® un network leader nei servizi professionali alle imprese, presente in oltre 150 Paesi con 457 mila professionisti. Offriamo soluzioni innovative e sostenibili in Audit & Assurance, Consulting, Financial Advisory, Risk Advisory, Tax e Legal. Il nostro obiettivo √® supportare le aziende nello sviluppo e nell'implementazione di strategie al passo con il mercato.

In Deloitte la sostenibilit√† √® un tema centrale. Per questo, attraverso le strategie e le progettualit√† legate alle tematiche Environmental, Social e Governance (ESG), ci impegniamo a promuovere una crescita responsabile, sostenibile e inclusiva per il Pianeta, le nostre persone e la societ√†. Scopri di pi√π sulle nostre strategie di Corporate Sustainability, tra cui Well-being, la strategia volta a migliorare il benessere fisico, mentale e sociale delle nostre persone, affinch√© siano felici e piene di energia in tutti gli ambiti della loro vita e WorldClimate, la strategia globale di Deloitte per diventare un‚Äôorganizzazione Net Zero e per guidare scelte responsabili all‚Äôinterno e all‚Äôesterno dell‚Äôorganizzazione.

Sei pront* a #MakeAnImpactThatMatter insieme? Candidati ora!

Le persone interessate possono inviare la propria candidatura con autorizzazione ai sensi del dlgs. 196/2003. La ricerca rispetta il d.lgs. 198/2006, il D.lgs. 215/03 e il D.lgs. 216/03 ed √® aperta a candidat* di qualsiasi orientamento o espressione di genere, orientamento sessuale, et√†, etnia e credo religioso. Il presente annuncio √® stato ideato nel rispetto della diversity e dell‚Äôinclusivit√†.

Title: Data Analyst Intern
Description:
Who We Are

At Heritage, we are dedicated to being at the forefront of the alternative investment industry by creating a next-generation fund that combines traditional investment sourcing and evaluation strategies with proprietary technology solutions and data-driven approaches.

Our mission is to connect elite families and entrepreneurs globally with carefully vetted top-performing private market opportunities, leveraging our digital products to make the alternative investment market more accessible, efficient, and connected. Furthermore, we embrace the principles of "skin in the game" as we co-invest with our partners, and "innovation" as we work to create lasting value through continually advancing the investment sector.

Our team comprises of a diverse international group of individuals from leading organisations and with diverse backgrounds, including private equity, venture capital, banking, software development, law, and entrepreneurship. We are committed to attracting top-notch talent and providing opportunities for growth and development based on their individual strengths and interests

Your role

About

Are you passionate about leveraging technology to drive financial innovation? We‚Äôre on the hunt for energetic individuals to provide exceptional operational support and insight, helping propel our team to new heights. During your time at Heritage, you will gain exposure to a wide range of activities at the intersection of finance and technology:


Be a data expert ‚Äì Use your analytical mindset to work with complex data sets. Analyze daily transactions and bank statements to build clear, compelling visualizations of client net worth‚Äîincluding both public and private assets.
Own the account aggregation tool ‚Äì Take full ownership of the tool, ensuring the database remains accurate and efficient. Continuously identify areas for improvement and lead innovation initiatives.
Leverage Bloomberg ‚Äì Use Bloomberg tools to conduct deep analysis of public securities and extract actionable insights.



Who We Are Looking For


A fast-paced, analytical, numerical thinker who thrives in a dynamic environment
Committed to excellence, with a proven track record of achieving results through data-driven decision-making
An exceptional problem-solver with strong analytical and critical thinking skills
Intellectually curious, constantly seeking new knowledge and skills in analytics and programming
Independent yet collaborative, ready to make a difference within our team
Ideally, you have experience working with Tableau, Power BI, Python or R
Fluency in English
Available for a 6-month internship starting in May 2025



What We Offer

A paid internship in the heart of Milan lasting six enriching months, will help shape you into a well-rounded professional. You will join an international team from 10+ nationalities whom you will interact with daily and at quarterly team-building events.

Join us for an experience that combines professional growth with a positive work environment. Your journey begins here!

Hiring Process

The Hiring Process At Heritage Includes The Following Stages


CV Screening
English and Critical Thinking Assessment
Cultural Fit Interview
Technical Interview
Logic & Attitude Assessment
Final Interview with the Department Manager
Offer



At Heritage, we are proud to have a diverse team representing over 15 nationalities, with all communication conducted in English. We are deeply committed to providing equal opportunities and work actively to remove potential biases in our hiring process by involving a Hiring Committee in all decision-making.

By applying to this job offer, you confirm that you have read and understood Heritage's privacy policy: http://bit.ly/privacypolicy121.

  • A fast-paced, analytical, numerical thinker who thrives in a dynamic environment
  • Committed to excellence, with a proven track record of achieving results through data-driven decision-making
  • An exceptional problem-solver with strong analytical and critical thinking skills
  • Intellectually curious, constantly seeking new knowledge and skills in analytics and programming
  • Independent yet collaborative, ready to make a difference within our team
  • Ideally, you have experience working with Tableau, Power BI, Python or R
  • Fluency in English
  • Available for a 6-month internship starting in May 2025


What We Offer

A paid internship in the heart of Milan lasting six enriching months, will help shape you into a well-rounded professional. You will join an international team from 10+ nationalities whom you will interact with daily and at quarterly team-building events.

Join us for an experience that combines professional growth with a positive work environment. Your journey begins here!

Hiring Process

The Hiring Process At Heritage Includes The Following Stages

  • CV Screening
  • English and Critical Thinking Assessment
  • Cultural Fit Interview
  • Technical Interview
  • Logic & Attitude Assessment
  • Final Interview with the Department Manager
  • Offer


At Heritage, we are proud to have a diverse team representing over 15 nationalities, with all communication conducted in English. We are deeply committed to providing equal opportunities and work actively to remove potential biases in our hiring process by involving a Hiring Committee in all decision-making.

By applying to this job offer, you confirm that you have read and understood Heritage's privacy policy: http://bit.ly/privacypolicy121.

Title: Data Analyst/Data Governance
HTML:
Phoenix Group opera dal 2008 come polo di consulenza manageriale, corporate finance e servizi tecnologici e operativi per lo sviluppo del business e l‚Äôottimizzazione di processi e progetti di banche, assicurazioni, operatori dei pagamenti e imprese.

Posizione:

PHOENIX CAPITAL SRL, √® alla ricerca di un Data Analyst/Data Governance

Il ruolo prevede:

  • Raccolta dei requisiti del business;
  • Controllo e analisi dei dati;
  • Studio dei processi si Governance;
  • Esperto di data Governance, sia con skills di analisi e sia con competenze verticali IT o di soluzioni SW (es. EDC o Informatica PowerCenter );
  • Gestione, su varie corporate Bancarie.

Requisiti:

Il profilo ideale ha:

  • Seniority: MID/Senior;
  • Location: Milano;
  • Presenza: di almeno un giorno sul cliente a Milano;
  • Conoscenza della lingua inglese;
  • Conoscenza avanzata della suite MS Office.

Title: Internship - Data Science
Description:
At ION

We want to innovate the financial services offered by commercial/retail banks in Italy in the areas of wealth management, credit lending, risk management and compliance. Building on our consolidated expertise and product offering in the Capital Markets domain, we want to scale our solutions and frameworks to the commercial/retail banking industry. To do so, we start from the quantitative modelling and analysis of the current processes put in place by our customers, so that we can profile opportunities of automation and prioritize client needs on manual/painful workflows. The resource will be involved in business process analyses of Italian commercial/retail financial institutions and is expected to integrate structured information extracted from interviews with the analysis of literature and documentation to build a quantitative picture of the AS-IS. The analysis will then be complemented with a consequent implementation analysis and product roadmap definition to design the TO-BE and drive product evolutions and developments. The project entails modelling complex business contexts, extracting structured information from unstructured sources, performing quantitative analyses, presenting findings and recommendations to external clients and internal stakeholders, contributing to the definition of product backlogs.

What You Will Learn During Your Intern


Quantitative modelling of business processes
Codification of customer requirements, needs, activities
Business intelligence with PowerBI/Excel - Packaging high-quality deliverables for external clients ‚Äì
Data manipulation with Pandas or Spark/Hive


What You Need To Know


Hands-on experience with BI tools (Excel, PowerBI)
Experience with Python data science libraries (pandas, pyspark, sklearn) is nice to have
Fluent English


We Are Looking For Someone Who


is passionate about modelling unknown business contexts with a quantitative approach
can find a good trade-off between quality and speed of delivery
proactively contribute your insights and ideas in a way that fits existing frameworks of the firm
is fond of sharing knowledge with colleagues and documenting your work
Show more
HTML:
At ION

We want to innovate the financial services offered by commercial/retail banks in Italy in the areas of wealth management, credit lending, risk management and compliance. Building on our consolidated expertise and product offering in the Capital Markets domain, we want to scale our solutions and frameworks to the commercial/retail banking industry. To do so, we start from the quantitative modelling and analysis of the current processes put in place by our customers, so that we can profile opportunities of automation and prioritize client needs on manual/painful workflows. The resource will be involved in business process analyses of Italian commercial/retail financial institutions and is expected to integrate structured information extracted from interviews with the analysis of literature and documentation to build a quantitative picture of the AS-IS. The analysis will then be complemented with a consequent implementation analysis and product roadmap definition to design the TO-BE and drive product evolutions and developments. The project entails modelling complex business contexts, extracting structured information from unstructured sources, performing quantitative analyses, presenting findings and recommendations to external clients and internal stakeholders, contributing to the definition of product backlogs.

What You Will Learn During Your Intern

  • Quantitative modelling of business processes
  • Codification of customer requirements, needs, activities
  • Business intelligence with PowerBI/Excel - Packaging high-quality deliverables for external clients ‚Äì
  • Data manipulation with Pandas or Spark/Hive

What You Need To Know

  • Hands-on experience with BI tools (Excel, PowerBI)
  • Experience with Python data science libraries (pandas, pyspark, sklearn) is nice to have
  • Fluent English

We Are Looking For Someone Who

  • is passionate about modelling unknown business contexts with a quantitative approach
  • can find a good trade-off between quality and speed of delivery
  • proactively contribute your insights and ideas in a way that fits existing frameworks of the firm
  • is fond of sharing knowledge with colleagues and documenting your work

Title: Finance Data Analyst - Apprendistato
Description:
Join us in pioneering breakthroughs in healthcare. For everyone. Everywhere. Sustainably.

Our inspiring and caring environment forms a global community that celebrates diversity and individuality. We encourage you to step beyond your comfort zone, offering resources and flexibility to foster your professional and personal growth, all while valuing your unique contributions.

Apply now for the position of Finance Analyst for the Southern Europe Business Performance Controlling Department in our Headquarter in Milan and you will carry out FP&A activities for the country and take part in the harmonization processes taking place on the 4 countries of the zone.

Your role:


Data Collection and Analysis: gathering and analyzing financial data to support planning and decision-making.
Budget Preparation Support: assisting in the preparation of annual budgets and financial forecasts.
Performance Monitoring: tracking financial performance against budgets and forecasts, identifying variances.
Strategic Decision Support: providing analytical support for strategic decisions, such as investment evaluations.
Cross-functional Collaboration: working closely with other departments to ensure financial decisions align with overall business goals.


Your expertise:


You are under 29 years old.
Master‚Äôs degree in economics, Statistics, Computer Science, Math or Engineering.
Good understanding of Office suite and Business Intelligence tools.
Interpersonal skills, result oriented, proactivity, autonomy, relational skills, team working.
Good knowledge of English and Italian language (spoken, written).
Knowledge of programming languages (i.e. SQL, Python, R, etc.)
Experience in applied Machine Learning and Predictive Analytics.
Deep knowledge of business intelligence tools.


Will be a plus:

To find out more about the specific business, have a look at www.siemens-healthineers.com.

Who we are:

We are a team of more than 71,000 highly dedicated Healthineers in more than 70 countries. As a leader in medical technology, we constantly push the boundaries to create better outcomes and experiences for patients, no matter where they live or what health issues they are facing. Our portfolio is crucial for clinical decision-making and treatment pathways.

How we work:

When you join Siemens Healthineers, you become one in a global team of scientists, clinicians, developers, researchers, professionals, and skilled specialists, who believe in each individual‚Äôs potential to contribute with diverse ideas. We are from different backgrounds, cultures, religions, political and/or sexual orientations, and work together, to fight the world‚Äôs most threatening diseases and enable access to care, united by one purpose: to pioneer breakthroughs in healthcare. For everyone. Everywhere. Sustainably. Check our Careers Site at https://jobs.siemens-healthineers.com/careers.

As an equal opportunity employer, we welcome applications from individuals with disabilities.

We care about your data privacy and take compliance with GDPR as well as other data protection legislation seriously. For this reason, we ask you not to send us your CV or resume by email. Please create a profile within our talent community and subscribe to personalized job alert that will keep you posted about new opportunities.

To all recruitment agencies:

Siemens Healthineers' recruitment is internally managed, with external support permitted only when a qualified supplier has established a formal contract with us. Unsolicited candidate submissions and referrals, absent a current supplier contract, do not establish consent and are ineligible for fees. We delete and destroy unsolicited information, thus, would recommend you refrain from any such practices. Your adherence to our policies is appreciated.

Title: Junior Digital Data Analyst
Description:
Do you enjoy analysing data, but also love to interact with non-technical stakeholders to present business-oriented insights?

Do you strive for excellence, but are also capable to find the right trade-off between time taken to deliver and the quality of the end result?

Do you perform best when working in a team, but are also willing to go solo when needed?

If you answered ‚Äúyes - that‚Äôs me!‚Äù to the questions above, then you should join Softlab‚Äôs Digital Marketing & Sales Practice as Digital Data Analyst (remote-first role, contractually based in Milano): you‚Äôll be working closely with our clients‚Äô teams to provide key data insights, using state-of-art digital analytics tools, that drive business decisions impacting both online and offline channels.

In Softlab, you‚Äôll be free to express your full potential working with our top-tier clients and having a real impact on the growth of our company.




What you‚Äôll do

Bring together data from multiple sources, leverage it to identify unspotted behaviours and drive changes based on actionable insights
Use available digital & non-digital data for answering any analytics-related question coming from business stakeholders
Translate high-level commercial requests into meaningful KPIs, and then in metrics and dimensions that can be measured
Present the results of your analyses being able to summarize the key insights, but also to drill down in the details
Proactively push to improve the status quo by experimenting with data analysis




What you bring

Good knowledge of Excel
Good knowledge of SAS, SQL, R, Python or similar solution for data analysis
Preferred: hands-on experience with digital analytics tools usage (e.g. Adobe Analytics, Google Analytics)
Good experience with other office tools (Outlook, Word, PowerPoint)
Attention to details, ability to meet deadlines, manage multiple priorities, and work in a team
Proficiency in Italian and English languages (written & spoken)
Preferred: statistics, mathematics, engineering, or similar STEM university background




What we offer

Stimulating experience in a dynamic consulting company: you will learn a lot and grow based on your performance
Pleasant environment, where the team generates value for our clients and builds strong relationships: you will always receive support and feel welcomed as a member of the Softlab family
Exciting work with innovative technologies and solutions: you will develop hard and soft skills that will always come handy, and will help defining advanced standards and best practices
Remote-ready work: if the project allows it, you‚Äôll have the possibility to work wherever there is a reliable Internet connection (the role will be contractually based in Milano)




We are a company certified for Gender Equality (Uni/PdR 125:2022). This position is open to all individuals who meet the technical requirements, regardless of gender.




Diversity, uniqueness, inclusion, equality




We believe that teams composed of diverse individuals generate better ideas and help us understand and support our clients more effectively. That‚Äôs why we ensure equal opportunities for everyone.

At Softlab S.p.A., we accompany every person from the moment they submit their application throughout their time with us, along a career path that does not consider or discriminate based on race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, or any form of disability.

As a company, we take responsibility for playing an active role in supporting a cultural and social shift that recognizes equal opportunities for all and a life free from discrimination.

Title: Junior Data Analyst
Description:
Questa posizione √® nel team di Alten Italy, una delle principali aziende nel settore della consulenza ingegneristica e IT.




Il riassunto dell'opportunit√† da parte della Joinrs AI: ALTEN cerca un Data Analyst con contratto ibrido a Milano. Richiediamo almeno 1 anno di esperienza e laurea in Informatica o Economia. Il candidato si occuper√† di analisi dati e creazione di report. Offriamo formazione avanzata e un ambiente di lavoro collaborativo.




Il processo di selezione sar√† interamente gestito da Alten Italy.




--




Ruolo: Data Analyst ‚Äì TELECOMMUNICATION

Luogo: Milano (ibrido)




ALTEN supporta le strategie di sviluppo dei propri clienti nelle aree dell‚Äôinnovazione, della R&D e dei sistemi informativi tecnologici.




Nato pi√π di 30 anni fa e presente in 30 Paesi, il Gruppo ALTEN si √® affermato come leader mondiale nell‚Äôingegneria e nei Servizi IT e leader Europeo per la consulenza nell‚Äôindustria Life Sciences.

Lavoriamo con attori chiave nei settori: Aeronautico &Spaziale, della Difesa & Navale, della Sicurezza, Automobilistico, Ferroviario, dell‚ÄôEnergia, del Life Sciences, Finanziario, del Retail e dei Servizi.




Con un fatturato di oltre 4.069 miliardi di euro, abbiamo attualmente pi√π di 57.400 collaboratori in tutto il mondo. In Italia siamo presenti in 12 citt√† lungo tutto il territorio nazionale: Torino, Milano, Gallarate, Brescia, Genova, Modena, Maranello, Bologna, Firenze, Roma, Napoli e Bari.




Di cosa ti occuperai:

Raccolta, gestione e pulizia dei dati provenienti da diverse fonti (database relazionali, file CSV, API, ecc.);
Scrittura di query SQL complesse per estrarre e analizzare grandi set di dati;
Creazione di report, dashboard e visualizzazioni interattive per supportare le decisioni aziendali;
Analisi dei dati per identificare tendenze, pattern, e opportunit√† di ottimizzazione;
Monitoraggio delle performance aziendali attraverso l‚Äôanalisi di KPI e altri indicatori di performance;
Supporto nell‚Äôautomazione dei processi di reporting e analisi per aumentare l‚Äôefficienza operativa.







Requisiti:

Almeno 1 anno di esperienza nel ruolo;
Laurea/Diploma in Informatica/Economia o titolo affine.
Ottima conoscenza di SQL per la gestione e l‚Äôanalisi dei dati;
Conoscenza degli strumenti di visualizzazione dei dati come Power BI, Tableau o simili;
Ottime capacit√† analitiche, attenzione ai dettagli e problem-solving;
Abilit√† comunicative e capacit√† di lavorare in team.







Perch√© scegliere ALTEN?




Technological challenges

Crediamo che la tecnologia abbia un grande potenziale per migliorare il nostro futuro, per questo ricerchiamo talenti che siano motivati a costruire oggi il mondo di domani. Con il nostro portfolio clienti e i diversi progetti di R&D attivi, in ALTEN avrai modo di lavorare su progetti all‚Äôavanguardia. La nostra Technical Direction ti accompagner√† e indirizzer√† durante il tuo percorso. Avrai la possibilit√† di metterti alla prova in contesti progettuali diversi e di confrontarti con esperti del settore per ampliare sempre pi√π le tue conoscenze. Potrai unire le tue passioni e metterti in gioco professionalmente. Accetti la sfida?







Inspiring Togetherness

Ci impegniamo a favorire un ambiente di lavoro sereno e collaborativo organizzando attivit√† di team building, iniziative di aggregazione, eventi sportivi, per conoscerci meglio e condividere momenti insieme. Il successo di un gruppo si fonda sulla cooperazione e condivisione reciproca del sapere e degli interessi.







Fulfilling Opportunities

In ALTEN troverai corsi formativi all‚Äôavanguardia per accrescere le tue competenze sia tecnologiche, sia linguistiche! Tramite ALTEN Academy potrai ottenere certificazioni con alcuni dei pi√π importanti schemi internazionali come IREB¬Æ, ISTQB¬Æ e altri. Attraverso Aula Streaming, invece, avrai accesso a corsi di formazione pi√π trasversali relativi a soft skills e potrai scegliere tra 12 corsi di lingua straniera.







Sustainable commitment

Crediamo che la tecnologia sia a supporto dello sviluppo sociale e della tutela ambientale. Oltre a collaborare a progetti che mirano alla sostenibilit√†, ci impegniamo a sostenere le cause che pi√π abbiamo a cuore, avendo collaborato e collaborando, tra gli altri, con AISM, AIRC, LILT, Save the Children, Treedom, This Unique. Valorizziamo l‚Äôunicit√† e ci impegniamo a garantire che tutte le nostre persone abbiano pari opportunit√† all‚Äôinterno della nostra azienda, fornendo loro gli strumenti per esprimere al massimo il proprio potenziale. Il nostro approccio alla diversit√† e all‚Äôinclusione si fonda sui principi di etica e integrit√† e rappresenta il fattore determinante per lo sviluppo di orizzonti di crescita personale e aziendale pi√π ampi. Promuoviamo l‚Äôinserimento e l‚Äôintegrazione lavorativa delle persone appartenenti alle categorie protette ‚Äì in base a quanto disciplinato dalla legge 68/99.







I prossimi step

Una volta ricevuto il tuo cv, ci prenderemo il tempo necessario per valutarlo attentamente.

Se sar√† in linea con questa o con altre posizioni aperte all‚Äôinterno del Gruppo, il nostro team Talent Acquisition ti contatter√† telefonicamente.

L‚Äôiter di selezione proseguir√† con un colloquio conoscitivo con l‚Äôarea Business, un successivo colloquio pi√π approfondito, durante il quale potrebbe essere richiesto un test pratico, ed infine un colloquio tecnico.

L‚Äôordine e il numero delle interviste potrebbero variare a seconda delle esigenze di selezione.

In alternativa, saremo felici di conservare il tuo CV nel nostro gestionale per poterlo rivalutare per opportunit√† future. Operando in 12 diverse citt√† e altrettanti settori, potrebbero contattarti pi√π Talent Acquisition Partner e/o pi√π Business Manager, se riterranno che il tuo profilo sia in linea con i progetti e le necessit√† che stanno ricercando in quel momento.

Se dovessi identificare ulteriori offerte di tuo interesse e in linea con il tuo profilo, aspettiamo la tua candidatura per poterla valutare nuovamente.

ALTEN opera nel rispetto dei principi di diversit√†, equit√† ed inclusione, che alimentano i nostri valori. ALTEN ha l‚Äôobiettivo di abbattere ogni barriera e pregiudizio, garantendo un ambiente di lavoro accessibile ed accogliente, valutando candidature indipendentemente da genere, etnia, disabilit√† (artt. 1 e 18, legge 68/99), et√†, orientamento sessuale, religione, stato civile, convinzioni personali e politiche, appartenenza ad organizzazioni sindacali, responsabilit√† familiari e back-ground socio-economico

ALTEN ha l‚Äôobiettivo di abbattere ogni barriera e pregiudizio, garantendo un ambiente di lavoro accessibile ed accogliente, valutando candidature indipendentemente da genere, etnia, disabilit√† (artt. 1 e 18, legge 68/99), et√†, orientamento sessuale, religione, stato civile, convinzioni personali e politiche, appartenenza ad organizzazioni sindacali, responsabilit√† familiari e back-ground socio-economico

Title: Data Analyst Assistant
Description:
Bolton Food

Industrial, Operations & Supply

Temporary

Cermenate, IT

Data Analyst Assistant

Data Analyst Assistant

We are looking for a Data Analyst Assistant to join our Industrial Department in our business unit Bolton Food & Trimarine based in Italy.

How you make the difference

You will collaborate with your manager for management of production systems and analysis of company data.

How Your Agenda Looks Like


You will manage daily verification and analysis of production data via Excel and other business management systems (ex. SAP 4HANA);
You will manage customized reports according to the business needs;
You will support to the Industrial Team in optimizing production processes through data analysis (plant indicators, yields, KPIs‚Ä¶etc.);
You will be responsible for verification and closing at the end of the month of the accounting and production movements;
You will collaborate in the creation and updating of business procedures.


Your Team

You will become part of the Industrial Team in Cermenate Plant, reporting to the Manufacturing Systems & Data Management Italy. You will collaborate with all the Industrial Team (Quality Control, HSE, Production‚Ä¶etc.).

What Makes You a Great Fit


Degree in Management Engineering, Computer science, Statistics, Business or similar;
Previous experience (2/3 years) in similar role;
Excellent knowledge of the Office suite and Excel;
Previous experience in SAP HANA;
Proactivity, problem solving, excellent communication and interpersonal skills and building solid relationships with internal and external stakeholders.


What‚Äôs In For You


Work location: Cermenate (CO) Italy
Contract type: Temporary 6 Months
Working Hours: Full Time
Company canteen
Remote Working: Standard business hours with remote working options available


Curious About Us? Dive In:

About Bolton

Bolton is an Italian family-owned fast-moving consumer goods company with 10.500 people located across 60 offices, 17 production facilities, 10 R&D laboratories, and 14 fishing vessels worldwide. With a diverse portfolio of over 60 quality brands, Bolton has been enriching the lives of millions of people every day for more than 75 years, making their everyday more delicious, more enjoyable, useful, and beautiful.

About Bolton Food & Trimarine

Bolton Food and Tri Marine, business unit of Bolton, oversee the entire food supply chain, including managing a fleet of fishing vessels and promoting sustainable fisheries (in collaboration with WWF and OXFAM). The production is conducted through a network of 10 specialized plants globally. We offer a range of well-known brands such as Rio Mare, Saupiquet, Cuca, and Isabel, providing innovative and carefully-prepared food products enjoyed by millions of families worldwide.

Grow Your Future with Us, Apply now

Title: Senior Data Analyst
Description:
About Satispay

At Satispay, we're not just reimagining payments; we're pioneering a movement toward simplicity and accessibility. Picture yourself at the forefront of innovation, leading the way in revolutionizing payments - and beyond! - across Europe, alongside a vibrant community of like-minded individuals driven by a shared vision: simplifying payments to improve everyone‚Äôs life.

Are you ready to be part of something bigger? Satispay is the place for you! Come be part of our dynamic team and help us shape the future of payments in Europe.

üöÄ Join us as Senior Data Analyst and let's make magic happen together.

Role Overview

As a Senior Data Analyst, you will join the Growth Intelligence team and collaborate closely with stakeholders from the Product Marketing, CRM, Business Development, and Engineering teams to identify business needs and uncover analytics opportunities.

Your Mission


Deliver real impact. Bring concrete impact to the Growth team and business line through analysis and implementation of rigorous data-driven solutions.
Analyze and drive. Analyze and interpret large datasets to derive actionable insights and support decision-making processes.
Design and optimize experiments. Develop and manage A/B tests to optimize and guide product and processes enhancements.
Create and maintain descriptive outcomes. Track key metrics and assist in the creation of visual representations (dashboards, maps) to communicate analytical insights effectively.
Manage analytic solutions. Modernize, standardize, troubleshoot, and maintain existing analytic solutions to ensure accuracy and reliability.
Cooperate. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate data into broader business strategies.
Stay current with industry trends. Continuously evolve the organization by adopting best-in-class technologies and techniques.
Enhance data-driven culture. Support decision-making and promote a data-driven culture through ad-hoc analyses and insights.


Your Ideal Profile


Proven experience and analytical skills. You have 5+ years of working experience in Business Intelligence or Data Analytics and can apply high-level analytical, statistical, and quantitative problem-solving skills to various scenarios. If you have a passion for working with data and a deep understanding of marketing campaigns, attribution, and web analytics, this is the perfect opportunity for you.
Expertise in programming. You possess advanced knowledge of SQL and query optimization, as well as extensive knowledge of Python or R. Additionally, you have experience with Looker, Tableau, or similar technologies.
Detail-oriented and communicative. You have a maniacal attention to detail and enjoy executing complex projects. You can communicate in a structured and convincing manner, adapting your style to build trust in a positive and professional way with various stakeholders.
Passion for fintech or startup environments. You are enthusiastic about working in dynamic, innovative settings.
Language proficiency. You are fluent in Italian and English.


Don't let a checklist hold you back - at Satispay, we thrive on diverse perspectives and unique strengths. Your individuality could be the missing piece to our puzzle! Even if you don't meet every skill listed above, we encourage you to apply if you're passionate about the role and believe you can contribute to our team's success.

Your Perks as a Satisperson

üôÜüèª Join an international team to grow with

üè° Hybrid working policy

üçΩÔ∏è Fuel your day with our meal vouchers

üåê Preply language platform access to expand your language skills

‚≠ê Benefit from our 1.2k company welfare budget

üöÄ Own part of Satispay‚Äôs success with our Stock Option Plan

üë©üèª‚Äçüíª Gear up with our tech equipment

ü•≥ Join us in the fun with team-building events, parties, trips, and more!

Our selection process is tailored to each role and includes at least a call with our Talent Acquisition Team, a remote technical evaluation, and a final in-person meeting. Your recruiter will share more insights during your first meeting with us!

Equal Opportunity Employer

At Satispay, we're proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and inclusion, welcoming individuals of all backgrounds. This opportunity is open to everyone, regardless - for instance - of race, color, religion, sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, and national origin. Join us in a workplace where everyone belongs!

Learn More About Us

Curious about our core values? Explore them here.

Title: Data Platform Analyst Intern
HTML:
Siamo Italiaonline, la pi√π grande internet company italiana. La nostra mission √® diffondere e accelerare la digitalizzazione del nostro Paese per garantire ai nostri Clienti la possibilit√† di ottenere risultati migliori nella loro vita digitale e nel loro business online attraverso servizi innovativi e di qualit√†.


La nostra direzione Information Technology ha il compito di supportare i processi dell‚Äôazienda attraverso la gestione dell‚Äôinfrastruttura, lo sviluppo della Data Platform e dei sistemi di supporto al business e delle piattaforme dei nostri prodotti digitali. Garantisce inoltre la governance dei progetti di sviluppo e la sicurezza del nostro patrimonio di dati.


Entrerai a far parte del team IT Data Platform Development, nella nostra direzione Information Technology, come Data Platform Analyst Intern.


Ti occuperai nello specifico di:


  • contribuire alla creazione, al collaudo e alla manutenzione di pipeline di dati scalabili per l'acquisizione, l'elaborazione e la trasformazione di dati provenienti da differenti fonti;
  • collaborare con team interfunzionali per comprendere i requisiti dei dati e contribuire alla progettazione e all'ottimizzazione dei modelli e dell'architettura dei dati;
  • contribuire all'implementazione della qualit√† dei dati e dei processi di governance per garantire l'accuratezza, la coerenza e l'affidabilit√† dei dati;
  • collaborare a stretto contatto con colleghe e colleghi per supportare le loro esigenze e fornire competenze tecniche nell'analisi dei dati;
  • contribuire alla creazione di report per la diffusione della Business Intelligence all'interno dell'azienda;
  • rimanere aggiornati sulle tecnologie emergenti e sulle migliori pratiche di ingegneria dei dati e contribuire alle iniziative di miglioramento continuo all'interno del team.


Caratteristiche richieste:


  • diploma in informatica o laurea in sistemi informativi, ingegneria o affini;
  • buone capacit√† di programmazione in linguaggi come Python, SQL;
  • familiarit√† con i concetti di modellazione dei dati e con i sistemi di database (ad esempio, database relazionali, database NoSQL);
  • familiarit√† con le piattaforme cloud (ad esempio, AWS, Azure, Google Cloud Platform) e con tool di reportistica (come PowerBI, Tableu) √® considerata un plus.


Cosa offriamo per la tua crescita professionale:



  • percorso di stage retribuito;
  • ticket restaurant;
  • modalit√† di lavoro ibrida, per garantirti il giusto equilibrio tra lavoro e vita privata;
  • possibilit√† di entrare in un‚Äôazienda italiana che si muove in un contesto digitale in continua trasformazione;
  • percorso ‚ÄúZ Academy‚Äù pensato per la tua crescita professionale.



Z Academy: dove crescita e opportunit√† si incontrano!


Z Academy √® un percorso formativo pensato e costruito per te.


Avrai la possibilit√† di confrontarti con il Leader e Manager del Gruppo Italiaonline, per stimolare idee creative ed innovative; conoscere l‚Äôazienda, il business, i clienti e i trend del settore per diventare Italiaonline Brand Ambassador.


L'obiettivo della Z Academy √® trasferire un ¬´metodo di lavoro¬ª e sviluppare competenze chiave attraverso momenti dedicati a: project management, sviluppo personale, comunicazione efficace.


Grazie alla Z Academy avrai l‚Äôopportunit√† di iniziare a costruire il tuo futuro, esplorando insieme nuove prospettive e sfide.



Sede di lavoro: Assago (MI)



Non lasciarti sfuggire questa occasione nel mondo digitale: candidati oggi e inizia un percorso unico in Italiaonline!

Title: Data Analyst | MILANO
Description:
Descrizione azienda

Vuoi un mini spoiler su CPM?

Ci prendiamo cura dei maggiori brand mondiali da oltre 80 anni attraverso diverse attivit√†, dal merchandising alle vendite, dalla consumer activation al supporto clienti fino alla formazione sul prodotto. Questa √® CPM, una realt√† internazionale forte e dinamica, come le persone che ne fanno parte. Per te, rappresenta la grande opportunit√† di entrare a far parte di una solida multinazionale dove formarti e sviluppare la tua carriera in un settore in crescita e in un ambiente giovane, innovativo e super stimolante. Un‚Äôesperienza che ti metter√† a contatto con i brand e le aziende pi√π importanti in Italia.

Candidati e‚Ä¶ magari ci vediamo a bordo!

Posizione

Ti offriamo di diventare il guru dei nostri dati.

Per te abbiamo una posizione come Data Analyst in un settore, il field marketing, dove la tua competenza pu√≤ davvero fare la differenza.

Potrai mettere in luce le tue capacit√† di analisi e interpretazione del dato al servizio di tanti brand diversi. Annoiarsi? Impossibile. Lavorerai nella nostra sede di Milano in spazi di nuova generazione e potrai operare anche da casa e ovunque grazie alle nuove politiche di smart working. Perch√© in CPM Italy siamo convinti che i tuoi risultati passino anche attraverso la qualit√† della tua vita.

Ok, ma cosa farai di preciso?

Il tuo ruolo riguarda l‚Äôanalisi e la presentazione dei dati riguardanti la vendita, il posizionamento e la valutazione di campagne promo e di comunicazione in store dei brand delle nostre aziende clienti.

Come?


realizzando report su misura;
utilizzando indicatori chiave di performance (KPI);
sviluppando e gestendo un avanzato sistema di business intelligence e dashboard online;
collaborando con i colleghi del team.



Requisiti

Sei tu la persona giusta?

Per entrare nel nostro reparto di Data Analyst √® richiesta un‚Äôesperienza di almeno 1 anno in questo ruolo. Essere positivi, proattivi e precisi √® un ottimo requisito ma i veri must sono la passione per i numeri e la voglia di partecipare sempre a nuove sfide.

In pi√π √® fantastico se‚Ä¶


ti piace trasformare dati in informazioni;
Excel √® il tuo pane quotidiano;
hai una conoscenza base di PowerBI ed SQL;
ti entusiasma lavorare in team;
sei flessibile sia come orari che di mentalit√†;



Altre informazioni

Ai sensi della legge 12 Marzo 1999 n.68, Inventa CPM promuove l'inserimento e l'integrazione delle persone disabili nel mondo del lavoro, per questo motivo verranno tenute in particolare considerazione le candidature di tutti i soggetti indicati al comma 1 art.1 della succitata legge.

Title: ICT - Business Intelligence Analyst Junior
Description:
Iper La grande i,

Azienda italiana leader della GDO, fondata nel 1974 e presente con oltre 20 ipermercati sul territorio nazionale

Ricerca per la propria Sede di Milano un/a: ICT Business Intelligence Analyst

Posizione:

Inserit* nel team Intelligence & Automation all‚Äôinterno della direzione Information & Communication Technology (ICT). La figura contribuir√† alla trasformazione dei dati in strumenti utili al supporto delle decisioni strategiche e operative, collaborando con le principali aree aziendali (vendite, acquisti, marketing, AFC) e le altre aree della direzione ICT.

La risorsa sar√† convolta nelle seguenti attivit√†:


Collaborazione con colleghi di team e stakeholder interni per raccogliere requisiti e definire KPI di business
Sviluppo di report, dashboard e strumenti interattivi tramite piattaforma BI (Qlik Sense)
Supporto utenti finali nell‚Äôutilizzo della reportistica sviluppata sulla piattaforma di BI
Contributo alla qualit√† e strutturazione dei dati, in forte sinergia con i colleghi di team che si occupano di Data Engineering


Requisiti:

Si richiedono:


Laurea in discipline STEM (Scienze, Tecnologia, Ingegneria, Matematica)
Conoscenza di SQL
Gradita conoscenza di almeno una piattaforma di Business Intelligence (es. Qlik Sense, Tableau, Power BI)
Gradita conoscenza piattaforme cloud, in particolare Google Cloud Platform (BigQuery)
Competenze analitiche, attenzione al dettaglio e capacit√† di problem solving
Buone capacit√† comunicative, orientamento al risultato e spirito di collaborazione

Title: Data Science Analyst
Description:
For the Central Team of Generali Global Corporate & Commercial (GC&C), we are looking for a Data Science Analyst to join our Insurance Department. Reporting to the Head of Technical Excellence, this position is key to leveraging data insights for comprehensive technical analysis, pricing strategies, and effective portfolio management. With a dynamic, cross-functional approach, the role includes demanding data integration across key domains such as Underwriting, Risk Engineering, and Claims, thereby contributing significantly to the company's strategic objectives. In addition, you will contribute to the development of the sustainability agenda of GC&C, working on carbon emission, green energy, and climate change initiatives.




Main responsibilities:




Portfolio Management

Supporting the analysis of the overall GC&C portfolio results, trends and patterns;
Designing and deploying the portfolio management discipline;
Implementing the portfolio monitoring tools;
Assisting BU in the target setting and supporting BU in achieving targets;
Performing data quality checks at all stages of portfolio management;
Preparation and steering of Portfolio review meetings;
Assisting UW functions in steering the business accordingly.

Innovation

Working collaboratively on pioneering new actuarial tools, integrating Machine Learning algorithms to enhance predictive capabilities;
Actively participate in defining business requirements to evolve the TechEx technology stack, in partnership with Operations;
Facilitate training sessions for the GC&C underwriting community on the TechEx tool suite, promoting skill enhancement and tool.

Sustainability and Net Zero Transition

Driving forward GC&C sustainability initiatives also in collaboration with Group Head Office;
Contributing to the development of a technical framework to embed Net Zero targets into GC&C underwriting strategy.




Requirements

The ideal candidate will meet the following requirements:




Studied Actuarial Science, Mathematics or Statistics or other quantitative disciplines, e.g. Engineering, Physics etc.
Quantitative, analytical mindset, problem solving skills
Insurance business processes knowledge experience is welcome
Ability to build lasting relationships
Strong communication and presentation skills
Familiarity with Python and R is valued
Must be fluent in Italian, English, additional languages are an advantage




Company Profile

Generali is a major player in the global insurance industry ‚Äì a strategic and highly important sector for the growth, development and welfare of modern societies.

Over almost 200 years, we have built a multinational group that is present in more than 50 countries, with 470 companies and nearly 82,000 employees. Our group aims to become the standard bearer and industry leader in the European retail insurance market, building on our existing base of 50 million retail clients, out of an overall total of 72 million.

Global Corporate & Commercial is the Generali Group unit developing P&C business and insurance services for medium and large companies. The unit acts on a global scale and deploys an integrated approach at Group level with a central management team and specialized teams active in individual countries. Through GC&C, Generali aims to become a key world player in the corporate-commercial segment.




Generali is proud to be an inclusive employer that considers applicants regardless of gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, ethnicity, disability, religion, political views, marital status or philosophy of life.

If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation or assistance, we will support you during the selection process.

Creare report, visualizzare i dati e creare dashboard (report basati su PowerBI)

Title: Data Analyst | MILANO
Description:
Descrizione azienda

Vuoi un mini spoiler su CPM?

Ci prendiamo cura dei maggiori brand mondiali da oltre 80 anni attraverso diverse attivit√†, dal merchandising alle vendite, dalla consumer activation al supporto clienti fino alla formazione sul prodotto. Questa √® CPM, una realt√† internazionale forte e dinamica, come le persone che ne fanno parte. Per te, rappresenta la grande opportunit√† di entrare a far parte di una solida multinazionale dove formarti e sviluppare la tua carriera in un settore in crescita e in un ambiente giovane, innovativo e super stimolante. Un‚Äôesperienza che ti metter√† a contatto con i brand e le aziende pi√π importanti in Italia.

Candidati e‚Ä¶ magari ci vediamo a bordo!

Posizione

Ti offriamo di diventare il guru dei nostri dati.

Per te abbiamo una posizione come Data Analyst in un settore, il field marketing, dove la tua competenza pu√≤ davvero fare la differenza.

Potrai mettere in luce le tue capacit√† di analisi e interpretazione del dato al servizio di tanti brand diversi. Annoiarsi? Impossibile. Lavorerai nella nostra sede di Milano in spazi di nuova generazione e potrai operare anche da casa e ovunque grazie alle nuove politiche di smart working. Perch√© in CPM Italy siamo convinti che i tuoi risultati passino anche attraverso la qualit√† della tua vita.

Ok, ma cosa farai di preciso?

Il tuo ruolo riguarda l‚Äôanalisi e la presentazione dei dati riguardanti la vendita, il posizionamento e la valutazione di campagne promo e di comunicazione in store dei brand delle nostre aziende clienti.

Come?


realizzando report su misura;
utilizzando indicatori chiave di performance (KPI);
sviluppando e gestendo un avanzato sistema di business intelligence e dashboard online;
collaborando con i colleghi del team.



Requisiti

Sei tu la persona giusta?

Per entrare nel nostro reparto di Data Analyst √® richiesta un‚Äôesperienza di almeno 1 anno in questo ruolo. Essere positivi, proattivi e precisi √® un ottimo requisito ma i veri must sono la passione per i numeri e la voglia di partecipare sempre a nuove sfide.

In pi√π √® fantastico se‚Ä¶


ti piace trasformare dati in informazioni;
Excel √® il tuo pane quotidiano;
hai una conoscenza base di PowerBI ed SQL;
ti entusiasma lavorare in team;
sei flessibile sia come orari che di mentalit√†;



Altre informazioni

Ai sensi della legge 12 Marzo 1999 n.68, Inventa CPM promuove l'inserimento e l'integrazione delle persone disabili nel mondo del lavoro, per questo motivo verranno tenute in particolare considerazione le candidature di tutti i soggetti indicati al comma 1 art.1 della succitata legge.

Title: Data Analyst Intern
Description:
Who We Are

At Heritage, we are dedicated to being at the forefront of the alternative investment industry by creating a next-generation fund that combines traditional investment sourcing and evaluation strategies with proprietary technology solutions and data-driven approaches.

Our mission is to connect elite families and entrepreneurs globally with carefully vetted top-performing private market opportunities, leveraging our digital products to make the alternative investment market more accessible, efficient, and connected. Furthermore, we embrace the principles of "skin in the game" as we co-invest with our partners, and "innovation" as we work to create lasting value through continually advancing the investment sector.

Our team comprises of a diverse international group of individuals from leading organisations and with diverse backgrounds, including private equity, venture capital, banking, software development, law, and entrepreneurship. We are committed to attracting top-notch talent and providing opportunities for growth and development based on their individual strengths and interests

Your role

About

Are you passionate about leveraging technology to drive financial innovation? We‚Äôre on the hunt for energetic individuals to provide exceptional operational support and insight, helping propel our team to new heights. During your time at Heritage, you will gain exposure to a wide range of activities at the intersection of finance and technology:


Be a data expert ‚Äì Use your analytical mindset to work with complex data sets. Analyze daily transactions and bank statements to build clear, compelling visualizations of client net worth‚Äîincluding both public and private assets.
Own the account aggregation tool ‚Äì Take full ownership of the tool, ensuring the database remains accurate and efficient. Continuously identify areas for improvement and lead innovation initiatives.
Leverage Bloomberg ‚Äì Use Bloomberg tools to conduct deep analysis of public securities and extract actionable insights.



Who We Are Looking For


A fast-paced, analytical, numerical thinker who thrives in a dynamic environment
Committed to excellence, with a proven track record of achieving results through data-driven decision-making
An exceptional problem-solver with strong analytical and critical thinking skills
Intellectually curious, constantly seeking new knowledge and skills in analytics and programming
Independent yet collaborative, ready to make a difference within our team
Ideally, you have experience working with Tableau, Power BI, Python or R
Fluency in English
Available for a 6-month internship starting in May 2025



What We Offer

A paid internship in the heart of Milan lasting six enriching months, will help shape you into a well-rounded professional. You will join an international team from 10+ nationalities whom you will interact with daily and at quarterly team-building events.

Join us for an experience that combines professional growth with a positive work environment. Your journey begins here!

Hiring Process

The Hiring Process At Heritage Includes The Following Stages


CV Screening
English and Critical Thinking Assessment
Cultural Fit Interview
Technical Interview
Logic & Attitude Assessment
Final Interview with the Department Manager
Offer



At Heritage, we are proud to have a diverse team representing over 15 nationalities, with all communication conducted in English. We are deeply committed to providing equal opportunities and work actively to remove potential biases in our hiring process by involving a Hiring Committee in all decision-making.

By applying to this job offer, you confirm that you have read and understood Heritage's privacy policy: http://bit.ly/privacypolicy121.

Your role

About

Are you passionate about leveraging technology to drive financial innovation? We‚Äôre on the hunt for energetic individuals to provide exceptional operational support and insight, helping propel our team to new heights. During your time at Heritage, you will gain exposure to a wide range of activities at the intersection of finance and technology:

  • Be a data expert ‚Äì Use your analytical mindset to work with complex data sets. Analyze daily transactions and bank statements to build clear, compelling visualizations of client net worth‚Äîincluding both public and private assets.
  • Own the account aggregation tool ‚Äì Take full ownership of the tool, ensuring the database remains accurate and efficient. Continuously identify areas for improvement and lead innovation initiatives.
  • Leverage Bloomberg ‚Äì Use Bloomberg tools to conduct deep analysis of public securities and extract actionable insights.


Who We Are Looking For

  • A fast-paced, analytical, numerical thinker who thrives in a dynamic environment
  • Committed to excellence, with a proven track record of achieving results through data-driven decision-making
  • An exceptional problem-solver with strong analytical and critical thinking skills
  • Intellectually curious, constantly seeking new knowledge and skills in analytics and programming
  • Independent yet collaborative, ready to make a difference within our team
  • Ideally, you have experience working with Tableau, Power BI, Python or R
  • Fluency in English
  • Available for a 6-month internship starting in May 2025


What We Offer

A paid internship in the heart of Milan lasting six enriching months, will help shape you into a well-rounded professional. You will join an international team from 10+ nationalities whom you will interact with daily and at quarterly team-building events.

Join us for an experience that combines professional growth with a positive work environment. Your journey begins here!

Hiring Process

The Hiring Process At Heritage Includes The Following Stages

  • CV Screening
  • English and Critical Thinking Assessment
  • Cultural Fit Interview
  • Technical Interview
  • Logic & Attitude Assessment
  • Final Interview with the Department Manager
  • Offer


At Heritage, we are proud to have a diverse team representing over 15 nationalities, with all communication conducted in English. We are deeply committed to providing equal opportunities and work actively to remove potential biases in our hiring process by involving a Hiring Committee in all decision-making.

By applying to this job offer, you confirm that you have read and understood Heritage's privacy policy: http://bit.ly/privacypolicy121.

Title: Internship - Data Science
Description:
At ION

We want to innovate the financial services offered by commercial/retail banks in Italy in the areas of wealth management, credit lending, risk management and compliance. Building on our consolidated expertise and product offering in the Capital Markets domain, we want to scale our solutions and frameworks to the commercial/retail banking industry. To do so, we start from the quantitative modelling and analysis of the current processes put in place by our customers, so that we can profile opportunities of automation and prioritize client needs on manual/painful workflows. The resource will be involved in business process analyses of Italian commercial/retail financial institutions and is expected to integrate structured information extracted from interviews with the analysis of literature and documentation to build a quantitative picture of the AS-IS. The analysis will then be complemented with a consequent implementation analysis and product roadmap definition to design the TO-BE and drive product evolutions and developments. The project entails modelling complex business contexts, extracting structured information from unstructured sources, performing quantitative analyses, presenting findings and recommendations to external clients and internal stakeholders, contributing to the definition of product backlogs.

What You Will Learn During Your Intern


Quantitative modelling of business processes
Codification of customer requirements, needs, activities
Business intelligence with PowerBI/Excel - Packaging high-quality deliverables for external clients ‚Äì
Data manipulation with Pandas or Spark/Hive


What You Need To Know


Hands-on experience with BI tools (Excel, PowerBI)
Experience with Python data science libraries (pandas, pyspark, sklearn) is nice to have
Fluent English


We Are Looking For Someone Who


is passionate about modelling unknown business contexts with a quantitative approach
can find a good trade-off between quality and speed of delivery
proactively contribute your insights and ideas in a way that fits existing frameworks of the firm
is fond of sharing knowledge with colleagues and documenting your work
Show more

Title: Data Warehouse Analyst
Description:
Company Description

Fineco Bank is a leading European bank with a 20 years history and a fully digital DNA with a branchless approach since the start. Fineco is one of the banks with the widest products range available. We have developed a truly one-stop-solution which includes trading, investment and payment services. We have developed a 100% proprietary platform for trading and investment which covers all customer needs from trading listed and OTC product to investment product such as mutual funds and ETF. In addition to this we also offer banking and payment solution for domestic and international demand.

Position

La funzione ICT sviluppa e gestisce le applicazioni software e l'infrastruttura tecnologica della Banca. Promuove la razionalizzazione in azienda di tutti i processi di lavoro, a supporto delle linee di business, tramite la rilevazione delle esigenze di servizi informatici e promozione delle opportunit√† tecnologiche offerte dall'evoluzione del sistema informativo.

Descrizione dell'attivit√†

Inserita all'interno dell'area Data Warehouse, la persona da noi ricercata sar√† chiamata a svolgere le seguenti attivit√†:


Analizzare le esigenze degli utenti interni in termini di reporting e analisi.
Esplicitare i fabbisogni informativi.
Disegnare e implementare le procedure di integrazione dati dai sistemi alimentanti.
Definire e implementare i reports e le analisi sui dati.



Requirements


Laurea in Ingegneria Informatica, Informatica o Statistica/Matematica.
Interesse verso le tematiche di modellazione dati, sviluppo e gestione database, business intelligence.
Conoscenza di almeno un database fra MS SQL Server, MS Access, Oracle, Sybase, MySQL.



Costituiscono Titolo Preferenziale


Esperienza con Analysis Services (SSAS).
Conoscenza di un qualche tool di business intelligence (per esempio PowerBI).



Si desidera entrare in contatto con persone che si distinguono per le ottime capacit√† relazionali, affidabilit√† ed autonomia organizzativa.

Completano il profilo una forte determinazione ed orientamento al risultato, una personalit√† vivace e proattiva, con ottime capacit√† organizzative e doti di riservatezza e affidabilit√†.

Other information

Sede di lavoro: Milano (alternanza presenza in sede e smart working)

Tipo di contratto: CCNL credito, tempo indeterminato

Il Gruppo Fineco √® orgoglioso di essere un Equal Opportunity Employer e si impegna a creare un ambiente di lavoro sicuro e inclusivo, fondato sul rispetto reciproco e la valorizzazione di qualsiasi diversit√†, offrendo pari opportunit√† di lavoro. Fineco ‚ÄúThe Place To Be‚Äù

Description:
CHI SIAMO

Il 31 Dicembre 2024 Swisscom, per il tramite della propria controllata Fastweb, ha finalizzato l'acquisizione di Vodafone Italia in vista di una integrazione delle due aziende.

Fastweb e Vodafone Italia da oggi lavoreranno insieme per creare un operatore convergente leader del mercato mettendo il meglio delle rispettive reti fisse e mobili e delle proprie competenze e capacit√† per offrire alle famiglie, alle aziende e al Paese servizi innovativi e a prezzi competitivi per continuare a promuovere la trasformazione in chiave digitale dell‚ÄôItalia.

Cosa troverai in Fastweb + Vodafone?

WE FEEL CLOSE #belonging

Insieme lavoriamo ogni giorno per creare un ambiente di lavoro informale e accogliente, in cui ogni persona possa portare il proprio contributo. Mostriamo apertura e curiosit√† nello sperimentare nuove soluzioni per noi e per i nostri clienti in un clima orientato alla collaborazione e al rispetto.

WE ARE SMART #flexibility

Smart working, autonomia nella gestione delle attivit√† e lavoro per obiettivi. Mettiamo le relazioni e i risultati al centro e promuoviamo una cultura di empowerment e collaborazione puntando su fiducia e responsabilit√†.

WE LEARN #impact

In Fastweb + Vodafone possiamo coltivare il nostro talento. Ciascuna persona √® alla guida del proprio sviluppo grazie a programmi innovativi e a percorsi professionalizzanti per costruire la propria crescita.

WE FEEL GOOD #wellbeing

In Fastweb + Vodafone le persone sono la nostra priorit√†. C‚Äô√® una grande attenzione al benessere fisico e psicologico e al mantenimento di un sano work life balance, oltre alla disponibilit√† di tanti servizi utili, gratuiti e innovativi per semplificare la quotidianit√† e coltivare passioni e interessi.

WE ARE UNIQUE #inclusion

In Fastweb + Vodafone l‚Äôinclusione √® una scelta, che rende l‚Äôambiente positivo, dinamico e ricco di stimoli. Facciamo tesoro delle differenze perch√© caratterizzano noi, la nostra clientela e il mondo che ci circonda: dall‚Äôincontro delle nostre unicit√† nascono creativit√†, innovazione e crescita continua.

WE ARE SUSTAINABLE #sustainability

In Fastweb + Vodafone l‚Äôattenzione verso un futuro pi√π sostenibile √® un impegno quotidiano.

Contribuiamo in modo concreto e misurabile al raggiungimento degli obiettivi globali, al benessere del pianeta e della societ√†. Integriamo la sostenibilit√† nelle nostre attivit√† di business, utilizzando energia elettrica proveniente al 100% da fonti rinnovabili e abilitando attraverso le nostre tecnologie la trasformazione ecologica e il superamento del digital divide.

WE CARE #customer

La nostra missione √® conquistare nel quotidiano la fiducia e la credibilit√† dei nostri clienti, garantendo esperienze di valore. Il nostro impegno consiste nel realizzare servizi sempre migliori, con l'obiettivo di offrire ai clienti soluzioni che rispondano alle loro esigenze e contribuiscano a costruire un futuro migliore.

CHI STIAMO CERCANDO ?

In Fastweb+Vodafone stiamo cercando un profilo di Coverage & Data Analysis Engineer per il Team Technology.

Il tuo obiettivo √® fornire analisi e proposte volte a garantire la migliore copertura tecnologica possibile, l'ottimizzazione delle risorse tecnologiche, l'efficienza degli investimenti necessari. Supporterai la valutazione e lo sviluppo di progetti strategici aziendali e di business (B2C,B2B, Wholesale).

In un ambiente dinamico puoi metterti alla prova e incrementare le tue competenze tecniche, collaborare con diversi team aziendali e contribuire direttamente alla crescita e all'innovazione dell'azienda.

DESCRIZIONE DEL RUOLO

In qualit√† di Coverage & Data Analysis Engineer nel Team Technology le tue attivit√† e responsabilit√† saranno le seguenti:


Analizzare la disponibilit√† delle diverse tecnologie di accesso sul territorio nazionale
Pianificare e gestire le risorse della rete di accesso in relazione alla copertura e al budget per progetti a medio e lungo termine
Supportare e proporre progetti strategici di deployment di rete in accordo con i vari dipartimenti aziendali
Fornire analisi e viste a supporto dei piani di capacity e decommissioning di rete
Creare reportistiche e dashboard relative a copertura, pianificazione ampliamenti e aperture di rete
Supportare la messa in campo dei servizi di copertura sui tool di produzione


REQUISITI ESSENZIALI


Laurea in discipline STEM preferibilmente ingegneria TLC, gestionale, informatica
Esperienza in ambito Data Analisys e Telecomunicazioni
Conoscenza di tool di data visualization (es. Tableau e/o Power Bi e/o Qlik Sense)
Ottima conoscenza del pacchetto office (Power Point, Excel)
Ottima conoscenza della lingua inglese
Eccellenti capacit√† analitiche e di sintesi
Forte orientamento al risultato
Proattivit√† e autonomia

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
Silbing is working with a leading organisation in Brussels looking for a Data Analyst to join on a 6-month contract (with likely extension). A great chance to shape high-impact projects in a fast-paced, international setting.




The role:




You‚Äôll work with large datasets, build dashboards, and deliver insights that directly support strategic decisions




Key responsibilities:




Analyse complex data to uncover trends and insights
Build and optimise dashboards (Power BI, Tableau, etc.)
Work closely with stakeholders to understand requirements
Translate data into clear recommendations
Support data quality initiatives




Requirements




3+ years as a Data Analyst
Strong SQL and Excel
Experience with modern BI tools
Excellent communication ‚Äì English essential, Dutch/French a bonus
Proactive and independent mindset

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
Permanent position only




WHAT IS CREAM ALL ABOUT?

We could be a Cream Factory, a cooking blog or even a detective agency‚Ä¶but in reality, we are a consulting company in Business & Technology active in large organizations and industry leaders in Banking, Insurance, Telecom, Energy, Pharmaceutical & Transport.




CREAM‚ÄôS SPECIAL RECIPE:

1/3 of Personal development
1/3 of Collective Intelligence
1/3 of Intrapreneurship

And Bonus ingredient: ‚Ä¶ Some passionate colleagues :-)




WHAT IS A DATA ANALYST AT CREAM?

As Benjamin, Data Analyst, you participate in the construction of the data strategy of our clients. You have a key role by helping them to deliver valuable insight based on their data. You are part of a challenging and multidisciplinary team.




YOUR TASKS :

You understand the business request
You dive into a large amount of data :
Collecting and interpreting data
Analyzing results
Identifying patterns and trends in data sets
Producing strategic data analysis and reporting to the business
You contribute to the selection and implementation of the different data analysis tools
In the end, you help the business to optimize the use of their data




HOW WE IMAGINE OUR FUTURE CONSULTANT:

You have at least 1-year experience in data analysis
You are passionate about data and you bring out concrete analysis to help the business
You are used to work with different data tools such as SQL, SAS, Python, R, Tableau, QlikView, PowerBI, ‚Ä¶
You have an analytical mind and inclination for problem-solving
You pay attention to details
You are fluent in French and English; good knowledge of Dutch is an asset




WHY SHOULD YOU TASTE CREAM/THE LIME FLAVOR?

A broad diversity of career options, you‚Äôre not stuck in a box
You evolve in a learning environment where you can challenge your knowledge with your colleagues
You grow in a company that is at the leading edge of technology
You have the opportunity to bring new ideas to develop a thriving company
We have values we share, live with and experiment every day




We just hire great people and give them the playing field to become awesome!




"THE LITTLE THING THAT CAN MAKE THE DIFFERENCE,

CREAM IS DEVELOPING A DIVERSITY PLAN AND WOULD LIKE THAT ALL ITS MEMBERS REFLECT THE SOCIETY IN ALL ITS DIVERSITY"

Title: Data Analyst - Power BI
Description:
Wij zoeken een Data Analyst / Power BI-expert om ons Microsoft-team te versterken!




Over LACO

LACO is een Belgisch bedrijf dat gespecialiseerd is in business intelligence en data-analyse, met meer dan 35 jaar ervaring. Als Microsoft Data & AI Solutions Partner hebben we uitgebreide expertise op gebieden zoals Microsoft BI en Data Governance. Met meer dan 120 consultants helpen we bedrijven succesvol te zijn met data. Bij LACO combineren we toewijding met een vleugje plezier in alles wat we doen.




Bij ons staan langetermijnrelaties met klanten en collega‚Äôs centraal. Onlangs hebben we enkele grote projecten binnengehaald bij belangrijke klanten, en daarom willen we ons Microsoft-team versterken om samen met het LACO-team end-to-endprojecten te realiseren.




Jouw rol

Als Data Analyst/Power BI-expert bij LACO ben je verantwoordelijk voor:

Het begrijpen en in kaart brengen van de bedrijfsvereisten.
Het verzamelen, opschonen en voorbewerken van gegevens uit diverse bronnen.
Het nauw samenwerken met multifunctionele teams en je expertise in Power BI inzetten om overtuigende visualisaties en rapporten te maken.
Het ontwerpen, optimaliseren en ontwikkelen van Power BI-rapporten en dashboards die voldoen aan de bedrijfsbehoeften en -vereisten.
Het samenwerken met stakeholders om gegevensvereisten te verzamelen en te begrijpen, en zorgen voor nauwkeurige en consistente data.
Het oplossen van problemen met Power BI-rapporten en het omzetten van complexe datasets in bruikbare inzichten door middel van datavisualisaties.
Het up-to-date blijven met de nieuwste Power BI- en Microsoft Fabric-functionaliteiten en best practices om uit te blinken in deze rol.




Jouw vaardigheden

Je hebt een bachelor- en/of masterdiploma in computerwetenschappen of een gelijkwaardige opleiding.
Je hebt een analytische mindset.
Je hebt minstens 3 jaar aantoonbare ervaring als Power BI Developer of in een vergelijkbare rol.
Je bent bekend met programmeertalen zoals SQL, DAX en Python.
Je kunt data modelleren met technieken zoals Kimball, Dimensional Modelling en Data Vault.
Je bent bedreven in Power BI, inclusief DAX, datamodellering en custom visuals.




Bonuspunten als je ‚Ä¶

Goede kennis hebt van Azure Synapse, Data Factory en Databricks.
Vertrouwd bent met diverse soorten gegevensopslag voor gestructureerde data.
Een sterke communicator bent en goed in teamverband kunt werken.
Vloeiend bent in Nederlands en Engels.




Ons aanbod

We werken graag samen met zowel werknemers als freelancers.
Je ontvangt een aantrekkelijk salarispakket en uitstekende extralegale voordelen.
Je krijgt toegang tot opleidingsmogelijkheden om je kennis te vergroten en je carri√®re verder te ontwikkelen.
Je werkt mee aan innovatieve Microsoft-trajecten die je uitdagen en inspireren.
Geniet van een geweldige bedrijfscultuur met ruimte voor leuke evenementen zoals familiedagen, jaarlijkse skireizen, sportevenementen, spelavonden, ‚Ä¶




Laat deze kans niet aan je datavingers voorbijgaan!

Neem contact op met ons Talent Acquisition-team en begin jouw avontuur naar succes.
